page.title: 02INDUSTRY IN WINCANTON
page.content: Industry plays a big part in the life of the town. Much of it is based upon {MILK.}The{Unigate}Factory has been a landmark for 50 years.{The Bulk Milk {Reload Station}is part of{Wincanton {Transport Group,}which together with {Wincanton Motor Group,}have their head offices here. There is also the modern{Trading {Estate}with products ranging from equipment for the disabled, aircraft components, boats,antique restoration, electronic systems to car spares. There are many{building firms:}Greens was established in 1840 and built the local Primary School in 1896. Dodge & Son make reproduction antique furniture. In the town there are two {coach companies:}Marshes and Wakes. Where the old mill used to be is now Orledge Animal Feeds. Schools and hospitals employ many people.
